channel.title: Mini Mouse
channel.description:
Ok, i'm thinking of buying a new mouse and this time 1 of those small ones, but before i buy it i was wondering if any of you has/had one. So i need to know if they're any good, comfortable when playing and doing stuff, etc. Some dude told me they suck but he's an idiot..
I Don't have enough money to buy a new one if the small one doesn't suit well, then i can just buy a regular one so if you had any experience with such mouse tell me cause from my POV they look awesome.
You know what i mean, right? [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/5834/bigsmallmousebitchassho.png[/img] [img]http://www.geekalerts.com/u/24-mini-mouse2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Mini Mouse
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:34, topic:326797”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=423203.msg3112583#msg3112583 date=1264655056]

Wireless mice suck.

Explain why, I’ve always used one for the last few years and have never had any problems ever.
[/quote]

I had a wireless mouse a couple of years ago, and it would drop out all the time in the middle of a game, or in the middle of anything. It was actually pure shit. In order to upgrade, I bought a $10 logitech wired mouse, then later on I got my G9.[/quote]

Well it depends what type of mouse you got. I had a pretty cheap wireless mouse/keyboard combo and the keyboard is the best keyboard I have used, and while the tracking on the mouse was pretty awful compared to a slightly better wired mouse I couldn’t really complain about it.

Read full topic

[/quote]

I had a wireless mouse a couple of years ago, and it would drop out all the time in the middle of a game, or in the middle of anything. It was actually pure shit. In order to upgrade, I bought a $10 logitech wired mouse, then later on I got my G9.

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Mouse
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Budda:

Get a G9. Wireless mice suck. Wires dont “limit mouse manuverability” if you’re a normal person that has their PC on a desk.

I have three desk computers in my house. Two have wires and one is completely wireless (keyboard, mouse).

The ones with wires always get caught in little cracks and I need to yank them out. My family always fights over use of the wireless computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Mouse
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

I have a $30 Microsoft Mouse that does just fine. No connection issues or anything like that. The battery life is quite a long time too. Even though I don’t support Microsoft for the most part, I am happy with this product.

Read full topic
